components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description: Moving from TC to AC project.
fields.summary: Black screen appearing on resume in android
fields.environment:
I am facing issue in android app. Black screen appearing on resume in android. Please help

Thanks in advance

comments.body: [~sbhambad] We need your environment information (Titanium SDK + Titanium Studio + Titanium CLI) version and OS information. Also, we need a simple runnable test case to reproduce this issue.

Thanks for replying  Ritu  Agrawal,

Bellow is the environment information
1] Titanium SDK  =  3.2.0.GA
2] CLI version   =  3.2.0
3]  Titanium Studio = 3.2.0.201312191547-19122013154853

Test case to reproduce issue
1I open android app.
2] hit the Home button. 
3] wait a while (at least several minutes)
4] go back to app (black screen with no functionality.) 

App link

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=mobapp.at.airheadsmobile
Thank you for providing the requested information. We don't diagnose the issue at the app level. You need to give us a simple runnable test case to diagnose the issue further.

Hi Ritu,

Can you please elaborate on the simple runnable test case bit, we are confused as to what specific information you need.

This is a pretty urgent issue and is stopping us to use Appcelerator for other applications, i hope you understand that the application is in Production.

We are trying to figure out if this is an app issue or a platform issue since we have seen several other appcelerator based applications having the same issues.

Detailed Steps: 
1. If you open the application, and open several other applications.
2. Android memory manager destroys the application in the background and thus when you go back and resume the application you see a black screen.

We have been struggling with a suitable fix for past few weeks and are ok to buy support if needed.

Please let me know how we can escalate this issue if needed or guide us to the right contact person.

Thanks
Sandeep

[~jwincao] Thank you for pointing to the right ticket.

[~sbhambad] We understand your concern and appreciate your patience. This is an already open issue and is under Engineering radar.
I will be more than happy to introduce you to the person if want to get paid support. His name is Radamantis and he manages and takes care of all the customer related issues. 

[~rtlechuga] FYI
Resolving this ticket as a duplicate of TIMOB-16538. Please follow along with TIMOB-16538 for latest updates.

Hi Ritu,

Is there an ETA or workaround for this ?

We are in urgent need of building a fix for this.

Thanks
Sandeep

[~sbhambad] , we can not replicate this issue, we've been trying with no success, it's going to be really helpful if you can send us a simple test case replicating the issue, and also sending your logs , ti config details and the information about the device on which you are experiencing this issue.

Best regards

Thanks for replying Radamantis Torres-Lechuga,

Test case to reproduce issue 
1I open android app. 
2] hit the Home button. 
3] wait a while (at least several minutes) 
4] go back to app (black screen with no functionality.)

we have attached tiapp.xml and log file

[~sbhambad] can you please provide a simple test case to reproduce the issue? A valid test case it's a simple small application that exhibits the issue, we can't work with your full application.

Best regards
